revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = #51 Babiri |image = [[File:Babiri.png]] |caption = This Berry is very tough with a strong flavor. It was used to make medicine by people in the past. This Berry plant is very hardy and resistant, causing less mutations around it. |growtime = 18h 0m 0s |harvest = 36 berries |replant = 50% |mutation = 0.01% |points = 2,400 |flavor =
*25 spicy *10 dry *0 sweet *0 bitter *0 sour }} '''Babiri''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with 4 [[Shuca]] and 4 [[Charti]] berries. == Growth Tables == === Growth Stages === {| class="wikitable" | style = "image-rendering: pixelated" !!! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 2 hours - 4 hours 30 min || 4 hours 30 min - 9 hours || 9 hours - 18 hours || 18 hours - 1 day 12 hours |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:BabiriTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:BabiriTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:BabiriTreeBerry.png|50px]] |- ! Aura (Mutation Chance) | ||
x0.5 ||
x0.25 ||
x0 |} === Ripening Time with Modifiers === {| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modifier !! Ripe-Wither Time !! Boost Mulch Needed to Ripen |- ! None | 18 hours -
1 day 12 hours || --- |- ! Mulch or Sprayduck | 12 hours -
1 day || 144 mulch |- ! Mulch & Sprayduck | 8 hours -
16 hours || 96 mulch |} == Flow Chart == [[File:Babiri_Flow_Chart1.png|500px]]
